original_title: Squonk Opera's Astro-Rama: Live Under The Stars
overview: For the first time ever, you can enjoy the full Squonk experience in the comfort of your home! Watch the outdoor spectacle that the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette called one of the most memorable musical moments of 2008 -"The visuals were outstanding and Squonk's progressive-rock was transcendent.‚Äù
title: Squonk Opera's Astro-Rama: Live Under The Stars
